entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.ClientCompressedUnary #41248
  • Improve JSON validation schema generation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #41246
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Adopt consistent approach for defining IVT in the repo #41244
  • Spruce up `OpenApiResponse` creation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` package #41243
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/aspnetcore #41242
  • When sending MultipartFormDataContent from HttpClient, the MediaTypeHeaderValue.TryParse does not handle multipart boundary value enclosed with quotes correctly #41237
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41235
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Poor performance resolving tilde paths in Razor tags #41234
  • Azure Web Swaps Warmup Pings Do Not Support HTTPS #41231
  • Document how to use ASP.NET Core with trimming #41229
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Introduce Results.Typed factory methods for creating results whose types properly reflect the response type & shape #41009
    7.0-preview4
  • Simplify virtualize in flex by setting flex-shrink:0 on placeholders automatically #40262
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add the code in Counter.razor, press Ctrl + F5 then delete this code, error "ENC0033 Deleting auto-property 'IncrementAmount' requires restarting the application" pop up #41133
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (MVC) generates controller with blocked namespace #39992
  • Hot Reload still not working in VS2022 v17.2 in aspnet core web app #41112
  • CustomAuthenticationProvider does not work as expected(Does not fire NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged(GetAuthenticationStateAsync()); #41228
  • Call to builder.WebHost.UseUrls breaks Blazor Server app in VS17.1.4 #41165
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient updated to 4.0.1 #40273
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Use handler directly in gRPC interop tests #41251
    area-grpc
  • Let it hang for 2 days #41250
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Split KestrelTrace into multiple files #41245
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41240
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41238
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Bump async from 2.6.3 to 2.6.4 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #41196
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine ClientCompressedUnary #41248 #41249
    7.0-preview4
  • Raise HTTP/2 stream end event in tests with lifetime handler #41230
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Simplify 'Virtualize' when using 'display: flex' on the scroll container #41241
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a1cc8c5` to `80600e5` #41233
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution
